Prompt.Prompt: Extract from the text which food was made. Save the food made under "food". Then group the ingredients, saving the name as "name" and the quantity as "quantity". At the end, generate a JSON like the example: { "food": "Pasta with tomato sauce", "ingredients": [ { "name": "pasta", "quantity": "200g" }, { "name": "tomato", "quantity": "3 units" }, { "name": "olive oil", "quantity": "2 tbsp" } ] }
